charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WAS INVOLVED IN A PHYSICAL ALTERCATION WITH A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, HAVING BEEN INVOLVED IN AN OFF-DUTY INCIDENT, DID THEREAFTER FAIL AND NEGLECT TO REPORT SAID INCIDENT TO THE PATROL SUPERVISOR.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, DID WRONGFULLY CONSUME AN INTOXICANT TO THE EXTENT THAT SAID OFFICER WAS UNFIT FOR DUTY.
DID WRONGFULLY AND WITHOUT JUST CAUSE PREVENT OR INTERFERE WITH AN OFFICIAL DEPARTMENT INVESTIGATION.

charges.description: FAILED TO MAKE ACTIVITY LOG ENTRY
FAILED TO PREPARE A UF-250 STOP AND FRISK REPORT.
IMPROPERLY SEARCHED A VEHICLE OCCUPIED BY PERON KNOWN TO DEPARTMENT
IMPROPERLY FRISKED PERSON KNOWN TO DEPARTMENT
WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO FOLLOW PRISONER TRANSPORT PROCEDURES AND TO PROPERLY SAFEGUARD THE PRISONER, RESULTING IN THE ESCAPE OF SAID PRISONER.
WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY MISREPRESENTED TO HIS SUPERVISOR, THAT HE WAS NOT QUALFIED TO OPERATE A PRISONER VAN WHEN, IN FACT, HE WAS SO QUALIFIED.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF AN INTOXICANT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, DID CONSUME AN INTOXICANT TO THE EXTENT THAT SAID POLICE OFFICER WAS UNFIT FOR DUTY.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, REFUSED TO SUBMIT TO A CHEMICAL BREATH TEST.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, FAILED TO NOTIFY THE OPERATIONS UNIT UPON HIS RELEASE FROM CUSTODY THAT HE HAD BEEN ARRESTED.
